name: Coots: Grand Slap Animal Bout
description:
Welcome ladies, gentlemen and that technical rainbow in between to a fun little game we call "Coots: Grand Slap Animal Bout". 

The game was made for Ludwig Jam 2023 which theme was "Coots". You play Coots as a boxer versus other streamer´s pets. Goal is to beat your opponents and claim your trophy. And if you really want to, try to complete some achievements.

So we hope you are ready for a grand slap animal bout and you enjoy yourself ;)
